desc.p: Fields PORTFOLIO.NO to EXCH.RATE form a related multi value set. Standard T24 rate field.

Fields PORTFOLIO.NO to EXCH.RATE form a related multi value set. Standard T24 amount field.

This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.

This is a NOINPUT field.
Standard T24 currency field.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the CURRENCY file.
This field must be set to YES if SEC.OPEN.ORDER records are to be created.
